desc.en: Two subway systems operate in Tokyo: Tokyo Metro and the Toei Subway. Most of the network is located in the 23 special wards, with portions extending into Chiba and Saitama Prefectures. The subways are one part of Greater Tokyo's passenger rail network, with through service further connecting the subway to suburban railways in Western Tokyo and Kanagawa Prefecture.

updateHistory.reason: Fix station translations such as Oshiage and Higashi-shinjuku. Also improving line styles and name offsets such as those around Shibuya. Add English description.
